overview: Hot and horny Brit lad, Luke Desmond, is a man on a mission – a secret mission, which he undertakes with the kind of testosterone-fuelled fury that you’d expect from a lad with a cock like his. Talk about big! This special agent needs a special licence for a weapon of those proportions, and what’s more he’s never afraid to use it in the service of Queen and country. No hungry pucker is safe, as Desmond leaps to action Skyfall-style to rescue us from the perils of non-descript porn in this ass-stretching, spunk-splattered fantasy!
title: Skyball
